Drag and drop your CSV or Excel files, or browse files

Supports CSV, XLSX, XLS • Max 100MB per file

Smart Column Detection

Supported Formats

  • • CSV files with any delimiter
  • • Excel files (.xlsx, .xls)
  • • Custom warehouse formats
  • • Files up to 100MB

Auto-Detected Columns

  • • UPC/Barcode/GTIN codes
  • • SKU/Product identifiers
  • • Warehouse/Location data
  • • Pricing and inventory

Need Help?

File Requirements

  • • Files must contain UPC/barcode data
  • • Include warehouse or location identifiers
  • • CSV files should have headers in the first row
  • • Excel files can have multiple sheets (first sheet used)
  • • Maximum file size: 100MB

What Happens Next?

  • • Smart column detection identifies data structure
  • • Files are processed for UPC conflicts
  • • Real-time progress updates via notifications
  • • Detailed analysis results with conflict breakdown
  • • Automatic team notifications for critical issues

Pro Tip: Our smart column detection works with any warehouse format. You don't need to format your data - just upload it as-is and we'll handle the rest!
